channel.title: Need Help With My 562
channel.description:
need assistance on coding a specific request.
The problem is, i have set the source to a eco, but the way the server has it is. when you die, anywhere or by anything you don't lose. so having eco is pretty much useless. i need help on changing it where you lose items on death.
my msn is itz_megan@live.com
will use Showmypc or Teamviewer
NEED HELP ASAP PLEASE
